name: Death Stranding: I'll Keep Coming
summary: “I’ll Keep Coming”, serves as the fourth track from Low Roar’s second studio album, 0. The song gained popularity after legendary video game developer Hideo Kojima used it in the teaser for Death Stranding, his first solo video game following the termination of his contract with Konami Digital Entertainment.
